rule-21-17-a.test_description: The project has one building segment with two zones. Baseline ruleset project description has system 7 with < 300 kBtu/hr, has AFUE equal to 80% as per Tables G3.5.6.  Expected result: PASS

standard.rule_description: All boilers in the baseline building design shall be modeled at the minimum efficiency levels, both part load and full load, in accordance with Tables G3.5.6.

rule-21-17-b.test_description: The project has one building segment with two zones. Baseline ruleset project description has system 7 with < 300 kBtu/hr, has AFUE equal to 80% as per Tables G3.5.6, BUT efficiency_metric is incorrect.  Expected result: FAIL

standard.rule_description: All boilers in the baseline building design shall be modeled at the minimum efficiency levels, both part load and full load, in accordance with Tables G3.5.6.

rule-21-17-c.test_description: The project has one building segment with two zones. Baseline ruleset project description has system 7 with < 300 kBtu/hr, AFUE does not equal 80% as per Tables G3.5.6.  Expected result: FAIL

standard.rule_description: All boilers in the baseline building design shall be modeled at the minimum efficiency levels, both part load and full load, in accordance with Tables G3.5.6.

rule-21-17-d.test_description: The project has one building segment with two zones. Baseline ruleset project description has system 7 with greater than 300 kBtu/hr but less than 2,500 kBtu/hr, has thermal efficiency equal to 75% as per Tables G3.5.6.  Expected result: PASS

standard.rule_description: All boilers in the baseline building design shall be modeled at the minimum efficiency levels, both part load and full load, in accordance with Tables G3.5.6.

rule-21-17-e.test_description: The project has one building segment with two zones. Baseline ruleset project description has system 7 with greater than 300 kBtu/hr but less than 2,500 kBtu/hr, has thermal efficiency equal to 75% as per Tables G3.5.6, BUT efficiency_metric incorrect.  Expected result: FAIL

standard.rule_description: All boilers in the baseline building design shall be modeled at the minimum efficiency levels, both part load and full load, in accordance with Tables G3.5.6.

rule-21-17-f.test_description: The project has one building segment with two zones. Baseline ruleset project description has system 7 with greater than 300 kBtu/hr but less than 2,500 kBtu/hr, thermal efficiency does not equal 75% as per Tables G3.5.6.  Expected result: FAIL

standard.rule_description: All boilers in the baseline building design shall be modeled at the minimum efficiency levels, both part load and full load, in accordance with Tables G3.5.6.

rule-21-17-g.test_description: The project has one building segment with one zone. Baseline ruleset project description has system 12a with greater than 2,500 kBtu/hr, has combustion efficiency equal to 80% as per Tables G3.5.6. Expected result: PASS

standard.rule_description: All boilers in the baseline building design shall be modeled at the minimum efficiency levels, both part load and full load, in accordance with Tables G3.5.6.

rule-21-17-h.test_description: The project has one building segment with one zone. Baseline ruleset project description has system 12a with greater than 2,500 kBtu/hr, has combustion efficiency equal to 80% as per Tables G3.5.6, BUT efficiency_metric incorrect. Expected result: FAIL

standard.rule_description: All boilers in the baseline building design shall be modeled at the minimum efficiency levels, both part load and full load, in accordance with Tables G3.5.6.

rule-21-17-i.test_description: The project has one building segment with one zone. Baseline ruleset project description has system 12b. Expected result: Not Applicable

standard.rule_description: All boilers in the baseline building design shall be modeled at the minimum efficiency levels, both part load and full load, in accordance with Tables G3.5.6.
